message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value to you, I am confident it will be an excellent investment. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $950,000.
Alice, thank you for the offer. I acknowledge the value of the product. However, I had a different budget in mind. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to $700,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the product's value. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a compromise at $825,000. This price reflects a middle ground between our initial offers, aiming to be fair to both parties while ensuring a reasonable profit for us.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $800,000 is my firm limit. If you can meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
